1.3.1.commit_description: Support using cmake28 for building OPM when cmake is not present.

1.3.0.commit_description: Update code; lower parallel job count; add opm-material. Should be great now!

1.2.0.commit_description: Update against latest OPM code as of this morning... Also pull in some of the test profile changes from HPCC for HOSTFILE, OPM_NUM_THREADS, etc.

1.1.0.commit_description: Update OPM code to 2012-10-26 pre-packaged snapshot by Michael Larabel. Should be working great aside from segv issue and the OPM not evidentally internally validating the results right now.

1.0.0.commit_description: Initial ocmmit of the OPM Open Porous Media test profile from Statoil.
